titleStmt.title: The speech of His Grace, James Duke of Ormond, Lord Lieutenant of Ireland, to both Houses of Parliament, on Saturday the 27 of September, 1662. Upon His Graces giving the royal assent to several Acts of Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1661-1669 : Ormonde)
Ormonde, James Butler, Duke of, 1610-1688.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by John Crook, printer to the Kings most Excellent Majesty, and are to be sold by Sam. Dancer,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
